privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy is issued by BARUCH ENTERPRISE SPAIN S.L., operating under the commercial name Baruch Real Estate, with registered address at C. Cam. Viejo de Málaga, 28, 29700 Vélez-Málaga, Málaga, Spain, CIF, and contact email info@baruchrealestate.com. At Baruch Real Estate, protecting your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you interact with our website (www.baruchrealestate.com) and our services. We are committed to ensuring that your data is handled in compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Spanish Data Protection Law (LSSI-CE).

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
body: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:
• Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, mailing address, and payment details.
• Property Information: Details about properties you list or inquire about.
• Usage Data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and analytics data.
• Cookies: Small files stored on your device to enhance functionality and remember preferences.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
body: We use the collected information to:
• Provide, manage, and improve our real estate services.
• Process transactions and manage listings or inquiries.
• Communicate updates, offers, and personalized recommendations.
• Ensure website security and prevent fraud.
• Comply with legal obligations.

sections.heading: 3. Information Sharing
body: We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share data with:
• Trusted partners (e.g., payment processors, IT service providers) to facilitate transactions.
• Law enforcement or government authorities when required by law.

sections.heading: 4. Data Security

sections.heading: 5. Your Data Protection Rights
body: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
• Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
• Withdraw consent at any time.
• Object to or restrict processing.
• Request data portability.
• Lodge a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD).

sections.heading: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

sections.heading: 7. Third-Party Links

sections.heading: 8. Changes to This Policy

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy is issued by BARUCH ENTERPRISE SPAIN S.L., operating under the commercial name Baruch Real Estate, with registered address at C. Cam. Viejo de Málaga, 28, 29700 Vélez-Málaga, Málaga, Spain, CIF (pending), and contact email info@baruchrealestate.com. This Cookie Policy explains how Baruch Real Estate uses cookies and similar technologies on its website (www.baruchrealestate.com). Please read this policy together with our Privacy Policy for full transparency on how we collect, use, and safeguard personal data.

sections.heading: 1. What Are Cookies?
body: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help improve user experience by remembering preferences, enabling essential functionality, and providing analytical insights about site usage.

sections.heading: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
body: • Essential Cookies: Required for website functionality and navigation.
• Analytical Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site to improve performance and usability.
• Functional Cookies: Allow the website to remember user preferences (language, location, etc.).
• Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure campaign performance (if applicable).

sections.heading: 3. Third-Party Cookies
body: Some cookies on our website are placed by third-party services such as Google Analytics or social media plugins. These providers may collect and process data according to their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review their terms directly for more information.

sections.heading: 4. Managing and Disabling Cookies
body: You can manage your cookie preferences or disable cookies at any time by adjusting your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality and performance of our website.
Instructions for popular browsers:
• Google Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
• Mozilla Firefox: Options → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
• Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Manage Website Data
• Microsoft Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

sections.heading: 5. Consent
body: When you visit our website for the first time, a cookie banner appears requesting your consent. By continuing to browse or selecting 'Accept', you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

sections.heading: 6. Updates to This Cookie Policy
body: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. Any updates will be posted on this page with the revised effective date.
